creation_history: Created by Andreas on January 14th, 2022. Reason: Agni made the first Dark Knight Rises reference [here](https://discord.com/channels/830522505605283862/830522505605283866/931479489584697344) and Andreas later created the emoji [in response](https://discord.com/channels/830522505605283862/830522505605283866/931492624274169866).
description: A [The Dark Knight Rises](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt1345836/) reference, usually accompanied by corresponding quotes.
remark: *Was shaving yaks part of your plan?*
name: Yakbane
